content: अयुक्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not yoked or harnessed. {@--2@} Not joined, united or connected. {@--3@} Not devout or pious, inattentive, negligent. {@--4@} Unpractised, unused, unemployed; °बुद्धि, °चार. {@--5@} Unfit, improper, unsuitable; अयुक्तोयं निर्देशः <ls>P. IV. 2. 64</ls>, <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--6@} Untrue, wrong. {@--7@} Unmarried. {@--8@} Opening externally. {@--9@} Reduced to straits, miserable.
